attributes.action: It's 45 years since the magical day when England won the World Cup. There should be a testimonial for the 1966 England Football Squad.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to arrange a testimonial football match at Wembley Staidum in 2011/12 to mark the 45th Anniversary of England winning the World Cup. The proceeds of the testimonial should be shared amongst the surviving members of the squad and the families of those who have since passed away.
